definition: to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能時開始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: As a developer, this is what you should strive for.
sentences.chinese: 這就是作爲一個開發人員所需要追求的。

sentences.english: What is it that people seek by undergoing such transformations?
sentences.chinese: 人們接受這樣的整形究竟追求什麼呢？

sentences.english: Both attended private schools and pursued their respective passions.
sentences.chinese: 他們都進私立學校，並追求自己的理想。

sentences.english: Anna's constant search for new ideas and challenges keeps her ahead of her times.
sentences.chinese: 對新理念與挑戰的不斷追求令安娜始終走在時代前列。

sentences.english: We have only a limited time to work and build success while we live on this planet.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，我們工作和追求成功的時間很有限。

sentences.english: This will be our outreach wind always pursuit of the goal.
sentences.chinese: 這將是我們展風永遠追求的目標。

sentences.english: So we, with an attitude of pursuing true emotion, seek for love.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們抱着追求真感情的態度，尋找愛情。

sentences.english: Conquering its challenges has become the quest of Chinese engineers.
sentences.chinese: 征服所有挑戰已經成了中國工程師們孜孜的追求。

sentences.english: Keep quality first, hanker for perfection.
sentences.chinese: 保持品質第一，追求完美。

sentences.english: There is no ignorance, there is knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 不會不學無術，我們追求知識。

sentences.english: The ambiguity is the conscientious pursuit of the Tarkovsky's films.
sentences.chinese: 多義性是塔爾科夫斯基電影的自覺追求。

sentences.english: Instead, I say piously that all I want are three things.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我很虔誠的說，我追求的只有三件事。

sentences.english: The vast uncontrollability of the environment has a great influence on our pursuit of joy.
sentences.chinese: 環境的不可控極大的影響了我們對於快感的追求。

sentences.english: But for a Sith, immortality was a futile pursuit.
sentences.chinese: 但對西斯而言，永生的追求只是枉然。

sentences.english: The essence of Su Shi's Ci was to pursue freedom.
sentences.chinese: 追求自由，是東坡詞的本質內核。

definition: to yearn for/to look forward to
to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
